contact.desciption: Click the button below to open your default email app (like magic!). I'll admit, I skipped making a custom form with just one useful field. Instead, you can send me your favorite dad joke, or just drop by to say hi!
contact.dadJoke: Why don't skeletons fight each other? Because they don't have the guts!
